item.title: Arknights
item.description:
$ W \xrightarrow{\text{Rosmontis} + \text{Blaze}} \text{Amiya} $ 1

  1. $$\text{\html{<img src="https://Ks4four.github.io/life/images/moe/arknights/W_icon.png" style="height:1.5em;vertical-align:middle;">}} \xrightarrow{ \text{\html{<img src="https://Ks4four.github.io/life/images/moe/arknights/Rosmontis_icon.png" style="height:1em;vertical-align:middle;">}} + \text{\html{<img src="https://Ks4four.github.io/life/images/moe/arknights/Blaze_icon.png" style="height:1em;vertical-align:middle;">}} } \text{\html{<img src="https://Ks4four.github.io/life/images/moe/arknights/Amiya_icon.png" style="height:1.5em;vertical-align:middle;">}}$$ ↩︎
